attributes.action: Make railcards available for ages of 26 to 59
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Railcards are only available for young people (16-25), families (must travel with a child), senior citizens (over 60) Disabled.

To enable affordable rail travel a general railcard should be made avaiable for any member of the British Public to purchase that enables the same reductions as the current railcards, if you do not have children or your children have grown up you are not able to purchase a railcard from the age of 26 to 59, this is a poor deal for people who want to travel by train to take the pressure off our busy road network.
